title: The droomme of Doomes day VVherin the frailties and miseries of mans lyfe, are lyuely portrayed, and learnedly set forth. Deuided, as appeareth in the page next following. Translated and collected by George Gascoigne Esquyer.
author: Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.
publisher: [By T. East] for Gabriell Cawood: dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the holy Ghost,
